entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -27.2°C

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023
